title: Big Changes?
body:
Hello. I had my computer confiscated due to bad behaviour in school, (i was being a retard), so I havent played league for about 5 months. I just wanted to know the BIG changes in the game since elementalist lux came out ( thats when i got it confiscated) Thank you everybody :)

By the way, can anyone detail the {{champion:19}}  and {{champion:3}} reworks?

replies.body:
Warwick: Is now broken trash with more mobility than Riven. He's also a mini Hecarim with that BS fear and damage resist.

Galio: Don't even bother. Riot ruined him.

New champions.

Camille: Don't waste your time with her as the bronzers cried and she was nerfed.

Xayah: Don't waste your time if you're below Gold as you won't be able to play her.

WW jungle is hardly broken, he's in a pretty good spot actually as far as I can tell. Not bs strong like the try hard Lees but not so weak he's useless.

Galio jung is still a strong pick, and a lot of fun. He's also pretty damn fun/effective in support. Don't play top so can't speak to that one.

Never played Camille.

Xayah is a champion that rewards mastery, just don't try to learn her in ranked for the love of all that is holy. A good Xayah can carry a game single handed.
Galio is good into a lot of ap matchups both mid and top imo.

Hi LevvyLeviticus!

5 months, were you here for the preseason changes?

On the game front:

**2017 Preseason** - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017
All details in link above but summary below

All players in OCE are now on the updated client (global roll out is happening as we speak too). In the new client you will find a bunch of things, including but not limited to access to current patch replays (where you can also clip highlights!) and the practice tool (single player, can adjust gold, levels, teleport around, adjust cool downs etc etc). Practice tool is a great place to perfect mechanics and jungle paths.

**Assassins update - **
Talon, Rengar, Leblanc, Katarina changed
Lethality updated (replaces flat armour pen)
Stealth mechanics changes (Camouflage and invisibility)
Control wards

**General gameplay changes**
We added plants (blast cone, scryers bloom and honey fruit throughout the jungle)
Changed jungle (more raptors, krugs multiply)
Mastery changes (courage of the colossus, bond of stone)
New items ( Aegis of the legion, knights vow, redemption)
